Author: Richard
Comment: …and by any chance do they still charge an extraordinarily expense booking fee as well? Probably better to wait for the DVD or get there early and stand in queue..Booooooo…Hissssss ;o)

Author: Phil Wilson
Comment:
It’s a lot, but not as much as the Vue charges. Small mercies?

In the end there were only about 30 people in the auditorium (it was Curse of the Golden Flower) so we would have been OK queuing, but I don’t really like running the risk.
